G

Game - Class in <Unnamed>
This class is used to handle the interactions between players and the game in a syncronized way.
Game(NavigableMap<String, Pair<Scanner, PrintWriter>>) - Constructor for class Game
Creates a game and orders the players turns in the game in alphabetical order and deals the cards to them.
getAllMembers() - Method in class database.Database
Queries the database for all the members in it.
getConnection() - Static method in class database.SqliteHelper
Opens a new connection to the database and stores it for when it is requested again.
This makes sure there is only one open connection to the database at any time.
getFriends(String[]) - Method in class database.Database
Queries the database for the friends of the specified member.
getPlayerCards(String) - Method in class Game
Returns the cards assigned to a specified player.
getPlayerOrder() - Method in class Game
Returns the turn order for the players in the game.
Example: For 3 players with usernames nick1, nick2, nick3.
getUserOutput(String) - Static method in class ServerStart
